EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Microservice Latency_Zipkin Distributed Tracing_Q216.Confirmati
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation - Understanding microservice latency: An introduction to Distributed Tracing and Zipkin
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Understanding microservice latency: An introduction to Distributed Tracing and Zipkin on Thursday, June 30, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, June 30, 2016 Time: 10:00AM PDT
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1194334/81B40EB753C5A65A90E77C5E9FF1139D]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
